mapper.insert: insert into reviewTbl values(review_sq.nextval, #{order_no}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{star}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select c.class_thumb, m.nick, c.class_name, c.class_price, o.member_id from orderTbl o join classoption co on co.class_option_no = o.class_option_no join classTbl c on c.class_no=co.class_no join memberTbl m on c.member_id = m.member_id where o.order_no=#{param1} and o.member_id=#{param2}

select * from (select * from (select review_no, r.order_no, content, img1, star, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') writedate, m.member_id, member_img, c.class_no, c.class_name from reviewTbl r join orderTbl o on r.order_no=o.order_no join memberTbl m on o.member_id=m.member_id join classoption co on o.class_option_no=co.class_option_no join classTbl c on co.class_no = c.class_no where o.member_id=#{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by review_no desc) rTbl where rownum <= (#{onePageRecord} * #{nowPage}) order by review_no asc) where rownum <= #{nowPageRecord} order by review_no desc
select count(review_no) totalRecord from reviewTbl r join orderTbl o on r.order_no=o.order_no where o.member_id=#{member_id}

select * from (select * from (select review_no, r.order_no, content, r.img1, star, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') writedate, m.member_id, member_img, co.class_no from reviewTbl r join orderTbl o on r.order_no=o.order_no join memberTbl m on o.member_id=m.member_id join classoption co on o.class_option_no=co.class_option_no where co.class_no=#{class_no} order by review_no desc) rTbl where rownum <= (#{onePageRecord} * #{nowPage}) order by review_no asc) where rownum <= #{nowPageRecord} order by review_no desc
select count(review_no) totalRecord from reviewTbl r join orderTbl o on r.order_no=o.order_no join classoption co on o.class_option_no=co.class_option_no where co.class_no=#{param1}
